attributes.review:
Honey bees must gather nectar from two million flowers to make one pound of honey.
One bee has to fly about 90,000 miles – three times around the globe – to make one pound of honey.
The average bee will make only 1/12th of a teaspoon of honey in its lifetime.
attributes.title: awful app.

attributes.review: I have NEVER in my life seen such trash. I can not believe Apple would allow this kind of hateful, distasteful content. Think of the children! WONT ANYONE THINK OF THE CHILDREN.
attributes.title: Too say this app was literal trash would be an insult to landfills across the world.

attributes.review: This app is slow and it takes up a lot of space. It’s also using my location when it’s closed!!
attributes.title: Slow

attributes.review: I opened the app to see an rotten orange that was on its verge of death telling me to “keep America great”. 🤮🤮🤮 and once I tried signing up the app gave me so many viruses that I am currently using a different phone to write this review.
attributes.title: Disgusting app

attributes.review: i’ve never downloaded an app that has caused me as much pain and frustration as this one. serious changes need to be made like idk... maybe... DELETING IT!!!! i am so angry 🤬🤬🤬🤬
attributes.title: can’t believe this app still exists😾😾

attributes.review: Okay first of all, what is the point of this app? more humiliation? i mean, does he really think that he can just take away our stuff and not get payback? no honey, sorry.......
attributes.title: This app is flat out humiliation for trump😂

attributes.review: I don’t know how to start the game, VERY CONFUSING, still don’t know how. The app then ask for my credit card number to get a beginner pack and took $160 out of my credit card!!
attributes.title: it stole my money😡😡😡

attributes.review: We tried to deal with it, put the product is defective. We would like to trade in for a new president. Preferably one that isn’t and ignorant dictator. Thank you. The app is gross too.
attributes.title: I just can’t anymore

attributes.review: I don’t know what else to say but that this app is completely disgusting. I can’t even open the app because the title of it is very unethical, only download it to leave a bad review.
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: This app is garbage. When I first got it the first message I received from the app was telling me to jump down a flight of stairs and light my hair on fire. I didn’t know the trumpster himself advocated for this. It’s garbage ✌🏻
attributes.title: This app belongs in hell!1!1!1!
